description:
* Based on the novel by http://anidb.net/cr5805 [Takahashi Yashichirou].
http://anidb.net/ch26 [Shana] and http://anidb.net/ch1246 [Alastor] — the Lord of the Crimson Realm — continue to do battle with the Guze no Tomogaras, who are trying to steal the Power of Existence from mortals. In the last battle, http://anidb.net/ch1220 [Yuuji] is revealed to be a mystes, a torch with nearly unlimited Power of Existence. Since the Tomogaras want to capture Yuuji and use him to upset the balance of the Realm, Shana resolves to protect Yuuji. Yuuji then vows to join Shana in her fight.

REGULAR.description:
The second semester has just begun, but Yuji is having a bad case of déjà vu—the whole day seems to be a repeat of events from last semester! Could it be the work of a Denizen?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Un temps pour un nouveau départ

REGULAR.description:
Wilhelmina wraps Yuji a little too hard in training, but they discover something new about his Power of Existence. Later at school, Shana and Yuji find themselves trapped in the same dream—and Kazumi is their only hope of escape!
Source: crunchyroll

A spoiled new student enrolls in Yuji’s class—and she’s a spitting image of a certain memory-absorbing Denizen! Shana draws out another enemy when she goes to great lengths to dispel her suspicions.
Source: crunchyroll

Konoe doesn’t seem to want to leave Yuji’s side. When the transfer student starts getting more and more of Yuji’s attention, the other girls can’t help but feel snubbed.
Source: crunchyroll

Shana’s so angry with Yuji that she can’t stand being around him. Wilhelmina notices Shana’s down in the mouth, so she decides to change up their evening meal routine—and achieves some oddly tasty results!
Source: crunchyroll

The gang gets together for a study session at Satou’s place, but a hungover Flame Haze won’t budge from her spot on the couch. When she finally crawls out, she ends up sharing some insight on the ins and outs of jealousy.
Source: crunchyroll

Ike painstakingly plans a group outing at the amusement park with high hopes of a having a romantic moment on the Ferris wheel with his favorite gal. But he forgot to factor in that every ride gives him the urge to lose his lunch!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ike Hayato, son jour de gloire

REGULAR.description:
Sato has a burning desire to become a Flame Haze, so he asks Margery Daw to train him. She’s reminded of the last time she agreed to train someone in New York during the Great Depression.
Source: crunchyroll

Margery continues to share her painful history against a shape-shifting foe and his time-altering accomplice. Yuji has more control of his power of existence than ever before. When he tries a new move, the results defy expectations.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 哀しみのマイルストーン

REGULAR.description:
Shana can’t explain Yuji’s silver flame. At school, a festival calls for picking costume couples, and one pair will be famous star-crossed lovers! Kazumi and Shana ask Yuji’s mom for help—and get a love talk from the man of the house!
Source: crunchyroll

The entire school is bustling with preparations for the upcoming festival. Wilhelmina returns from her research abroad with news that an infamous member of the crimson world will come for something inside Yuji.
Source: crunchyroll

While Yuji’s school kicks off the festival with a parade, Wilhelmina and Margery Daw discuss the heavier matters at hand. Shana’s dead set on dropping the “L” word to Yuji on stage, but a big wind blows in the dreaded enemy looking for her lost lover.
Source: crunchyroll

The school grounds transforms into a supernatural warzone. When Pheles reaches for the object of her desire, Yuji’s silver flame sends Margery Daw into destructive rage!
Source: crunchyroll

Yuji lends Pheles some of his power from the Midnight Lost Child. After enjoying the last day of the festival with the girls, Pheles takes a moment to thank everyone for allowing her true self to arrive—so she can try once more to take Yuji’s core!
Source: crunchyroll

The Ball Masque makes their next move right in the middle of Pheles’ attack! Shana and the other Flame Haze take action, but a girl everyone had grown to trust takes a stab at Yuji. His transformation comes as a surprise—especially to Pheles.
Source: crunchyroll

The festival is over, but after school activities involve making a plan to counter the Ball Masque. Kazumi dwells on her desire to be closer to Yuji and ponders the parting gift Pheles gave her. Will she be strong enough to use it when the time comes?
Source: crunchyroll

Yuji hones his fighting skills in order to protect himself from a foe that once nearly killed Wilhelmina. Then, two friends decide to take separate paths. While one wants to make a mark in the supernatural world, the other will walk away from it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Weg des Einzelnen und der aller

REGULAR.description:
Yuji trains feverishly to turn his power into a useful flame. He’s determined to leave the city with Shana—but she senses a faltering in his resolve when his mother falls ill. While he’s walking off harsh words, Yuji’s seized by identical Denizens!
Source: crunchyroll

Forced to follow his abductor, Yuji finds himself caught in a conundrum. But when he figures out the odd Denizen’s trap, he takes matters into his own hands.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Etwas, was nicht ausgesprochen werden konnte
Quelque chose qui ne pouvait pas être dit

REGULAR.description:
Sabrac ascends from the wake of Shana’s attack on the Wanderer. Everyone is badly hurt, and a spell worsens their injuries by the minute! Wilhelmina faces the familiar foe alone, but every effort to wrap him fails to leave even a scratch.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Scarlet Battle to the Death

REGULAR.description:
Yuji devises a plan to crack Sabrac’s seemingly endless source of power. When his strategy comes together, Shana makes her biggest flame yet to defeat the nearly invincible Denizen.
Source: crunchyroll

Yuji’s dad returns home to share some shocking news. Then, Shana and Kazumi plan to put Yuji’s true feelings to the test, but just as he arrives at their rendezvous, a horrendous scheme from the Crimson world takes shape.
Source: crunchyroll

The time is nigh for the Ball Masque to reap the Midnight Lost Child for their own sinister plan. Shana and the others struggle against an impenetrable bubble while Yuji battles countless bots inside!
Source: crunchyroll

Finally inside the Ball Masque’s forcefield, the three Flame Haze give it their all in a fiery battle to the finish. Shana and Yuji fight side by side to topple the armored giant and retrieve Yuji’s power of existence before he fades away!
Source: crunchyroll

Shana of the Burning Eyes II
